entries.name: delete(key)
entries.desc: Deletes the job at the given key.

entries.name: insert(irb)
entries.desc: Add the given irb session to the jobs Array.

entries.name: inspect()
entries.desc: Outputs a list of jobs, see the irb command irb_jobs, or jobs.

entries.name: irb(key)
entries.desc: Returns the irb session for the given key object, see search for more information.

entries.name: kill(*keys)
entries.desc: Terminates the irb sessions specified by the given keys.

entries.name: main_irb()
entries.desc: Returns the top level irb session.

entries.name: n_jobs()
entries.desc: The total number of irb sessions, used to set irb_name of the current Context.

entries.name: search(key)
entries.desc: Returns the associated job for the given key.

entries.name: switch(key)
entries.desc: Changes the current active irb session to the given key in the jobs Array.

entries.name: thread(key)
entries.desc: Returns the thread for the given key object, see search for more information.
